com.atc.simulator.display.model

Class Display

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atc.simulator.display.model.Display

  • public class Display
extends java.lang.Object
    Object model for the display

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Display.DelayedCameraListener
      A DelayedWorkQueueItemType which implements display camera listener in order to be able to put updates to models due to changes to the camera into the DelayedWorker's queue so that it can be processed gradually rather than bogging down the framerate and doing an update each time the camera changes (which while zooming could be once every frame).

      • addDelayedCameraListener

        public void addDelayedCameraListener(Camera camera,
                                     DisplayCameraListener listener,
                                     int priority,
                                     int cost)
        Add a new Display.DelayedCameraListener to this display and to it's DelayedWorker.
        Parameters:
        camera - camera to listen to
        listener - listener which will be listening to that camera
        priority - priority of work items generated from updates to the camera
        cost - cost of work items generated from updates to the camera in "work points"

      • addCameraListener

        public void addCameraListener(Camera camera,
                              DisplayCameraListener listener)
        add a camera listener to this display.
        Parameters:
        camera - the camera being listened too by the listener
        listener - listener of type DisplayCameraListener

      • removeCameraListener

        public boolean removeCameraListener(Camera camera,
                                    DisplayCameraListener listener)
        Remove a camera listener from this display.
        Parameters:
        camera - camera that the listener was listening to.
        listener - listener to remove.
        Returns:
        boolean whether or not a camera listener was removed.
